name: Jana Kalyana Samakya
briefDescription: Jana Kalyana Samakhya – JKS (Which means Peoples Welfare Organization) is a registered non-profit, secular voluntary development organization. JKS’s activities are spread over in 3 Mandals/Blocks in Vizianagaram District of Andhara Pradesh, India, covering nearly 21,000 populations in 62 villages. The region is situated in northern part of Andhra Pradesh, on the Eastern-Ghats and inaccessible pockets bordering Odisha state.Tribals and Dalits and other weaker sections such as Women and Children, landless, marginal and small farmers and Persons with disabilities constitute the target population. Various sectoral interventions include livelihood with focus on sustainable agriculture and Natural Resource Management, Child Rights & protection
